Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.name: shared
Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.abstract: A shared instance of Blockstack that exists for the lifetime of your app. Use this instance instead of creating your own.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.name: isBetaBrowserEnabled
Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.abstract: Use the latest, beta version of the Blockstack browser (https://beta.browser.blockstack.org) for authentication.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.name: signIn(redirectURI:appDomain:manifestURI:scopes:completion:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.abstract: Generates an authentication request and redirects the user to the Blockstack browser to approve the sign in request.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.abstract: Generates an authentication request that can be sent to the Blockstack

Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.name: generateTransitKey()
Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.abstract: Generates a ECDSA keypair and stores the hex value of the private key in local storage.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.name: loadUserData()
Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.abstract: Retrieves the user data object. The user’s profile is stored in the key profile.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.abstract: Check if a user is currently signed in.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.name: promptClearDeviceKeychain()
Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.abstract: Prompt web flow to clear the keychain and all settings for this device.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.abstract: Look up a user profile by Blockstack ID.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.name: extractProfile(token:publicKeyOrAddress:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.abstract: Extracts a profile from an encoded token and optionally verifies it, if publicKeyOrAddress is provided.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.name: wrapProfileToken(token:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.abstract: Wraps a token for a profile token file

Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.name: signProfileToken(profile:privateKey:subject:issuer:issuedAt:expiresAt:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.abstract: Signs a profile token. Issued by default today, and expires by default in 1 year (31557600 seconds).

Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.name: validateProofs(profile:ownerAddress:completion:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.abstract: Validates the social proofs in a user’s profile. Currently supports validation of Facebook, Twitter, GitHub, Instagram, LinkedIn and HackerNews accounts.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.name: validateProofs(profile:name:completion:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.abstract: Validates the social proofs in a user’s profile. Currently supports validation of Facebook, Twitter, GitHub, Instagram, LinkedIn and HackerNews accounts.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.name: listFiles(callback:completion:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.abstract: List the set of files in this application’s Gaia storage bucket.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.name: putFile(to:text:encrypt:completion:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.abstract: Stores the data provided in the app’s data store to to the file specified.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.name: putFile(to:bytes:encrypt:completion:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.abstract: Stores the data provided in the app’s data store to to the file specified.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.name: getFile(at:decrypt:completion:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.abstract: Retrieves the specified file from the app’s data store.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.abstract: Retrieves the specified file from the app’s data store.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.name: encryptContent(bytes:publicKey:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.abstract: Encrypts the data provided with the app public key.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.name: encryptContent(text:publicKey:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/c:@M@Blockstack.abstract: Encrypts the data provided with the app public key.

Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.name: decryptContent(content:privateKey:)
Classes/Blockstack.html#/s:10BlockstackA.abstract: Decrypts data encrypted with encryptContent with the transit private key.

Classes/Blockstack.html.name: Blockstack
Classes/Blockstack.html.abstract: A class that contains the native swift implementations of Blockstack.js methods and Blockstack network operations.

Classes/Keys.html.name: Keys
Classes/Keys.html.abstract: A helper class for cryoptgraphic key operations.

Classes/ProfileHelper.html.name: ProfileHelper
Classes/ProfileHelper.html.abstract: A helper class for Profile related operations.
